entry.title: Derby Originals Designer Series 600D Shimmering Star Dog Coat 1 Yr Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 23.99

Keep your canine companion warm and dry. Available in sizes and colors to accommodate most dogs. Sizes are measured from base of the neck to base of the tail.

Sizes: Small (12"-14") Medium (15"-18") Large (19"-23") X-Large (24"-27")

  • 600D ripstop waterproof, breathable outer shell
  • 200 grams poly fill, 210 T lining
  • Adjustable elastic belly wrap with quick-grip closure
  • Front buckle closure (1 for small, 2 for medium and up)
  • Shoulder gussets for freedom of movement

Included Components:
  • Includes limited 1 year warranty

entry.title: Derby Originals Ultra Flex Plush Microfiber Dog Bathrobe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 24.95

 

Derby Originals Ultra Flex Plush Microfiber Dog Bathrobe is designed with your pet’s comfort in mind. Our premium bathrobe is made of an ultra-high-quality, plush, soft to the touch, and absorbent microfiber material that instantly wicks away excess water and is comfortable for your dog to wear. Unlike other inferior dog bathrobes made of rough materials, our design won’t irritate or mat up your dog’s fur and produces a quick-drying effect. Our bathrobes are also the first robe on the market to feature an expandable shoulder gusset to ensure your dog has complete and total freedom of movement while wearing this bathrobe. Our bathrobes are available in four sizes, Small, Medium, Large, and X-Large to fit dogs of most sizes.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR DOG’S COMFORT IN MIND - our deluxe dog bathrobe is made of only the highest quality and plushest microfiber and features an easy on/off design and expandable shoulder gusset for increased comfort.
  • GREAT FOR BATHING, GROOMING, OR RAINY DAYS - our dog bathrobes are great for drying your pet off after a bath or swim, keeping them clean and comfortable after being groomed, or for warming up/drying your pet off after a walk.
  • MADE FROM HIGH-QUALITY ABSORBENT MICROFIBER - our dog bathrobes feature a solid microfiber construction that is extremely soft to the touch and is designed to wick away and absorb the maximum amount of excess water from your dog’s coat.
  • FEATURING A SHOULDER GUSSET FOR FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT - Other bathrobes can leave your dog feeling constrained. Our deluxe bathrobe is the only one on the market to feature an expandable shoulder gusset to allow your dog to walk/move freely.
  • UNIQUE BELLY-DRYING BELT DESIGN - our dog bathrobe features a tieable microfiber belt that is wider in the middle so that you can easily cover and dry your dog’s underside and prevent water from dripping off your dog’s belly.

entry.title: Derby Originals Adjust-to-Fit Horse-Tough Reflective 600D Waterproof Ripstop Nylon Winter Dog Coat 150g Polyfil with One Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 24.99 - 36.99 (35 variants)

Our Best Selling Design, Now New and Improved

We’ve taken our highest rated, best selling dog coat and made it even better by adding additional premium features such as two adjust-to-fit neck straps, which allows you to tailor the neck opening of this coat to fit your dog. This means you’ll now be able to get the best fit possible and prevent rain or snow from getting beneath your dog’s coat. We’ve also taken safety to the next level by adding a full band of reflective trim around the coat, so that your dog is highly visible at night or on walks. For maximum safety, try out our Safety Orange coat which was designed to protect your dog during hunting season.


Built Horse Tough

Derby Originals is a world class producer of durable, high quality horse blankets, and we carried that same strength, durability, and longevity over into our dog blankets. We took the features that make our horse blankets great, and put those in our dog coats. Features such as easy on/off and adjustable chest buckles, secure double hook & loop belly closures, removable elastic leg straps, soft no-rub linings, ripstop materials, and reinforced stitching are just some of the many features our blankets offer! All of these combined features make for a comfortable fitting, non-restrictive, long-lasting dog coat that truly is Built Horse Tough, but tailored to perfectly fit your dog!


210T Nylon No Rub Lining

This blanket contains a nylon No Rub 210T inner lining, which is made of a sleek, super silky and soft nylon fabric that was designed to help polish and protect your dog’s hair coat without damaging it. Unlike other materials, our soft 210T lining prevents and won’t cause rubbing, sore spots, and fur damage. Instead, this soft lining will help keep your dog’s fur coat looking shiny and healthy, while preventing hair damage, tangles, mats, and other common issues that can arise from friction and pressure on your dog's fur.

 

Product Features

BUILT FOR A HORSE, BUT TAILORED FOR YOUR DOG - our classic and best selling dog coats have been a customer favorite for years due to their horse-strong design with premium features like shoulder gussets and a double hook & loop closures.

NEW PREMIUM FEATURES - we’ve taken our best selling coat and made it even better by adding a pair of neck adjustments to allow you to get the most accurate fit for your dog, and adding reflective trim around the body of this coat to promote your dog’s safety on walks and hikes.

WATERPROOF DESIGN - this dog coat has a completely waterproof (but still breathable!) exterior and was designed to keep your canine companion warm and dry in even the worst weather conditions.

AN OPTION FOR EVERY DOG - this dog coat is one of the most versatile on the market, having a plethora of color and size options to suit every breed, size, and life stage of dog, and every pet parent’s taste!

NOT JUST A DOG COAT - this dog coat was designed to be versatile in size so that it can be used as a coat for a plethora of animals from goats to horses (our coats are ideal for mini horses and foals!).

 

For more details about the warranty, please visit the manufacturer Derby Originals website. Registration must be done online on manufacturer's website within 15 days of purchase or the warranty will be voided.

 

Product Specifications

Outer Material: 600D Nylon

Inner Material: 210T Nylon

Filling: Polyfil

Fill Weight: 150g

Ripstop: Yes

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Leg Straps: No

Size Options: 8”, 10”, 13.5”, 17.5”, 22”, 26.5”, and 28.5”

Color Options: Royal Blue, Orange, Turquoise, Purple, and Black

Machine Washable: Yes

Reflective: Yes

Warranty: One Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty, see details at https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/royal-international-warranty

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium Reflective Hydro Cooling Swamp Jacket with Adjustable Belly Band & Harness Compatible Opening
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 26.99 - 35.99 (6 variants)

Derby Originals innovative and new Premium Hydro Cooling Jacket is the perfect solution for keeping your pet safe and happy in harsh summer weather. These jackets keep your dog dry, but naturally cooled using the power of evaporation, for up to 10 or more hours! This premium version also features a new cooling belly band that is designed to be highly adjustable to fit more sizes and breeds of dogs, while also helping to keep your dogs belly and internal organs from overheating. These jackets are a perfect choice for those who want to take their dog on long walks or hikes, participate in dog sports, or simply keep their dog cool and safe from harmful UV rays. These coats were designed to help prevent potentially fatal heat stroke in dogs, and instead, keep your pup comfortable and happy in hot weather.

Before the first use, please dunk the product under water, gently squeeze out the excess water and let the product dry completely. This is necessary for the cooling fibers to set into the product. Please note, the product could feel 'soapy' because of the polyester fiber migration after the first activation. This rinses away on the next soaking.

NEW AND IMPROVED DESIGN - this premium version of our hydro cooling jacket has been designed with a cooling belly band that makes this coat more adjustable and effective than ever before. This new version also has reflective trim for added safety and visibility. This dog coat has a special opening feature that makes it compatible with harnesses and leashes.

PROTECTS AGAINST UV RAYS - these coats not only protects against heat but harmful UV rays from the sun as well. If you’re looking for UV protection that won’t add bulk and overheat your dog, these coats are perfect for you.

DESIGNED TO PREVENT OVERHEATING - these coats are great for longer haired, double-coated, or brachycephalic breeds who are prone to overheating, heat stress, and heat exhaustion. Keeping your dog cool with this coat could potentially save their life!

LIGHTWEIGHT THREE-LAYER DESIGN - this jacket is made of a three-layer, ultra-thin, quilted material. The outer layer reflects heat and evaporates water, the middle layer absorbs and retains water, and the inner layer repels water.

SOOTHES SORE MUSCLES AND JOINTS - another benefit of this cooling jacket is that it can be used to cool and soothe sore joints and muscles or relieve arthritis pain in your dog. The powerful cooling action of this coat acts like an ice pack and provides instant cooling relief.

entry.title: Derby Originals Ruff Pup 1200D Medium Weight Winter Dog Coat with Neck Cover 220g and Harness Compatible Opening
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 25.99 - 35.99 (25 variants)

Built Horse Tough

Derby Originals is a world-class producer of durable, high-quality horse blankets, and we carried that same strength, durability, and longevity over into our dog blankets. We took the features that make our horse blankets great and put those in our dog coats. Features such as easy on/off and adjustable chest buckles, secure double hook & loop belly closures, removable elastic leg straps, soft no-rub linings, ripstop materials, and reinforced stitching are just some of the many features our blankets offer! All of these combined features make for a comfortable fitting, non-restrictive, long-lasting dog coat that truly is Built Horse Tough, but tailored to perfectly fit your dog!


210T Nylon No Rub Lining

This blanket contains a nylon No Rub 210T inner lining, which is made of a sleek, super silky and soft nylon fabric that was designed to help polish and protect your dog’s hair coat without damaging it. Unlike other materials, our soft 210T lining prevents and won’t cause rubbing, sore spots, and fur damage. Instead, this soft lining will help keep your dog’s fur coat looking shiny and healthy, while preventing hair damage, tangles, mats, and other common issues that can arise from friction and pressure on your dog's fur.


OUR LATEST AND GREATEST DESIGN - this premium dog coat has been tailored to be comfortable and long-lasting, and has new great features such as a removable neck cover, reflective trim for added safety, elastic leg straps, premium buckle closures, and more! This dog coat has a special waterproof zipper feature that makes it compatible with harnesses.

WATERPROOF DESIGN - this dog coat has a completely waterproof (but still breathable!) exterior and was designed to keep your canine companion warm and dry in even the worst weather conditions.

1200D RIPSTOP CONSTRUCTION - this coat was made from a super tough rip and tear resistant 1200D nylon outer shell, which can withstand even the most destructive dogs and worst weather.

REFLECTIVE TRIM FOR ADDED SAFETY - this blanket features reflective trim covering the body and neck cover of the blanket for increased visibility in low light conditions or on nighttime walks.

PERFECT FOR WALKS AND HIKES - this reflective coat was designed to provide maximum warmth and comfort. This coat is waterproof and durable to keep your pooch dry, while the reflective build makes your dog safer and more visible during walks and hikes.

 

Product Specifications

Outer Material: 1200D Nylon

Inner Material: 210T Nylon

Filling: Polyfil

Fill Weight: 220g

Ripstop: Yes

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Leg Straps: Yes

Size Options: 13”, 17”, 22”, 26” and 28”

Color Options: Grey/Purple, Red/Black, Royal Blue/Black, and Charcoal/Black.

Machine Washable: Yes

Reflective: Yes

For more details about the warranty, please visit the manufacturer Derby Originals website. Registration must be done online on the manufacturer's website within 15 days of purchase or the warranty will be voided.

  • EASY-OFF DESIGN - our reflective parka features a two-sided velcro chest and belly band cover that makes putting on and taking off your dog’s coat as easy and quick as possible, while also helping to keep your dog’s chest and belly warm.

210T Nylon No Rub Lining

Unlike other materials, our soft 210T lining prevents and won’t cause rubbing, sore spots, and fur damage. Instead, this soft lining will help keep your dog’s fur coat looking shiny and healthy, while preventing hair damage, tangles, mats, and other common issues that can arise from friction and pressure on your dog's fur.

Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 13.99 - 24.99 (5 variants)

Reversible coat with a reflective stripe! Constructed to be breathable, water- repellant, and insulated. This jacket was made to be seen in dark conditions with the reflective stripe that runs down the back. Perfect for active dogs and owners that are ready to take on the rain, snow, wind, cold and times of low outdoor visibility.

  • 420D Nylon Water Repellant Outer Shell & 150 grams of polyfill insulation
  • Reversible design with breathable soft fleece plaid lining
  • Reflective stripe visible from both of the reversible sides provides safety and visibility
  • Simple to take on and off with Velcro tabs on the belly band and neck
  • Lightweight design which is ideal indoor use or for protection from wind, rain, & snow

entry.title: CuteNfuzzy All Purpose Fleece Lounger Warm Dog Sweater, Use as Indoor Blanket or Outdoor Coat, Great for Senior Dogs, All Sizes Available
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 9.99 - 14.99 (27 variants)

  • ALL PURPOSE - Made with soft durable fleece which will keep your dogs cozy and happy. Can be used indoors to keep your dog warm & comfy or can be worn outside to protect against winter conditions. Makes an excellent windbreaker.
  • SIMPLE PULL OVER or PULL OFF - Convenient and time efficient blankets with no zipper or snaps. Adjustable front chest and belly hook and loop velcro closures provide the perfect fit. No hassle so you can quickly be on the go. Use alone or under another coat for added warmth.
  • EASY TO CUSTOMIZE OR EMBROIDER - Attractive colors are perfect for designing your pup's personal vest design. Create your pooch's own ugly Christmas sweater or Halloween costume. Available in Burgundy with Grey, Navy with Grey, and Black with Teal. Popular for walks, jogs, and running.
  • SIZE IS DETERMINED BY LENGTH - Every canine is an individual so please measure your dog before selecting a size. The offered sizes accommodate many breeds. Available in x-small, small, medium, large, X-large, XX-Large. Measured in inches just like a dog horse blanket 14", 16", 18", 20", 22", 24", 26", 28", & 30".
  • MORE THAN JUST PET APPAREL - These jackets are an excellent way to relieve stiffness and soreness of your aging dogs. Selecting one of these coats for a senior doggie can provide gentle heating to their hips and joints to keep them comfortable. The heavy-duty fleeces are tear resistant and provide padding when laying down.

Fill Weight: 150g

Ripstop: Yes

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Leg Straps: No

Size Options: 13.5”, 17.5”, 22”, 26.5”, and 28.5”

Color Options: Black with Silver Trim, Purple with Lavender Trim, and Grey with Hurricane Blue Trim

Machine Washable: Yes

Reflective: No

Warranty: One Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty, see details at https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/royal-international-warranty

 

For more details about the warranty, please visit the manufacturer Derby Originals website. Registration must be done online on manufacturer's website within 15 days of purchase or the warranty will be voided.

entry.title: Derby Originals Comfort Fit Classic 600D Winter Dog Coat 1 Year Warranty 150g Insulation
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 31.99 - 34.99 (10 variants)

By cuteNfuzzy®, this heavy duty dog winter coat is great for daily walks! Put it on your dog when walking on brisk days to keep them warm and cozy. Reflective trim at the center of blanket and at the neck, help keep your pet safe and visible. This coat also carries a one year limited warranty!

  • 210T breathable durable lining
  • Adjustable Velcro closures at the belly and neck for a custom fit
  • Easy to put on and take off for everyday walks
  • Reflective trim helps keep your dog visible during night walks
  • 600D rip-stop waterproof and breathable nylon outer shell
  • 150 grams of Polyfill insulation for warmth

Included Components:
  • Includes limited 1 year warranty
